channel.title: Melanie Walker's Grounded
channel.description: Melanie Walker's podcast that explores all things adventurous and gardening.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Melanie Walker's podcast that explores all things adventurous and gardening.
channel.itunes:author: Melanie Walker
channel.itunes:summary: From Solid Gold Studios welcome to Grounded. Hosted by the ever-energetic Melanie Walker, this podcast explores outdoor adventures and gardens too.

item.itunes:author: Melanie Walker | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: The "Dagga" Debate | Quintin van Kerken
item.itunes:subtitle: The "Dagga" Debate | Melanie Walker and Michael Rickhoff with Quintin van Kerken (Chief Executive Clear Option on Cannabis)
item.description:
On this episode, Melanie and Mike Rickhoff (senior lecturer at Lifestyle college) chat to Quintin van Kerken, CEO of Clear Option on Cannabis, about what implications the recent rulings on Marijuana in SA have for people.

For more podcasts, visit SolidGoldStudios.co.za/grounded
item.itunes:summary: On this episode, Melanie and Mike Rickhoff (senior lecturer at Lifestyle college) chat to Quintin van Kerken, CEO of Clear Option on Cannabis, about what implications the recent rulings on Marijuana in SA have for people.
item.itunes:keywords: Dagga, Quintin van Kerken, Mike Rickhoff, Gardening, Grounded, Melanie Walker, Solid Gold Studios, Gavin Kennedy

item.itunes:author: Melanie Walker | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Shirley Wallington
item.itunes:subtitle: Melanie and co-host Mike Rickhoff talk to garden designer extraordinaire, Shirley Wallington, about her career and the upcoming Open Gardens Meander, brought to the city by the Johannesburg Garden Club.
item.description: Melanie and co-host Mike Rickhoff talk to garden designer extraordinaire, Shirley Wallington, about her career and the upcoming Open Gardens Meander, brought to the city by the Johannesburg Garden Club. Show notes are available at SolidGoldStudios.co.za/grounded

item.itunes:author: Melanie Walker | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Gavin Heron
item.itunes:subtitle: Melanie and co-host Mike Rickhoff talk to Gavin Heron of Earth Probiotic about how bokashi works, why we should make our own compost and the state of topsoil on earth.

item.title: Misha Teasdale
item.itunes:subtitle: Melanie talks to Misha Teasdale, CEO and founder of GreenPop about the projects they're creating in Africa. Join the Treevolution! Get planting...
